title: You Ain’t My Step Mama
itunes:title: You Ain’t My Step Mama
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I have been dating a man for 8 years and he proposed last month. Shortly after we met, he found out about a 2 year old daughter by a woman he had a one-night stand with. The child’s mother was messing with 2 guys so of course he took a paternity test. I drove him back and forth to visit his child, which was over 3 hours away. I was friendly with the child’s mother and his daughter and I became besties.................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I have been dating a man for 8 years and he proposed last month. Shortly after we met, he found out about a 2 year old daughter by a woman he had a one-night stand with. The child’s mother was messing with 2 guys so of course he took a paternity test. I drove him back and forth to visit his child, which was over 3 hours away. I was friendly with the child’s mother and his daughter and I became besties.................
